channel.title: Need help with getting people to connect to my server!

item.title: Need help with getting people to connect to my server!
item.dc:creator: @arrogantlyfly arrogantlyfly
item.description:
@arrogantlyfly wrote:

Ok so i’m trying to get my friend onto my server and i portwarded and made no-ip and all that stuff but when i put in the source what the client is supposed to connect to which i think is:
/**
* Initialise Handlers
*/
//VoteForCash.createConnection();
EventManager.initialize();
Connection.initialize();
//PlayerSaving.initialize();
//MysqlManager.createConnection();

	/**
	 * Clipped Following (NPC)
	 */
	
	/**
	 * Server Successfully Loaded 
	 */
	System.out.println("Server listening on port basedworld.no-ip.org:" + serverlistenerPort);
	/**
	 * Main Server Tick
	 */
	try {

It doesn’t work like i save it and compile and all that but nothing actually happens when i click ‘run-server’ the server itself is that ‘Team Torva’ and me and my friend are starting to think you just can’t use that server… Can anyone please help? I don’t understand this at all >.<
